mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_user_follow (user_id, follow_user_id, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{followUserId}, NOW(3))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bus_user_follow WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND follow_user_id = #{followUserId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, follow_user_id, create_time FROM bus_user_follow WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND follow_user_id = #{followUserId} LIMIT 1

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.position, u.avatar, u.company_id, c.company_name, u.is_buyer, u.is_seller, f.create_time AS follow_time FROM bus_user_follow f INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = f.follow_user_id AND u.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN bus_company c ON c.id = u.company_id AND (c.is_deleted IS NULL OR c.is_deleted = 0) WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY f.create_time DESC

SELECT r.id, r.company_id, r.user_id, c.company_name AS company_name, u.user_name AS user_name, u.nick_name AS nick_name, r.category_name, r.contract_no, r.quantity, r.quantity AS remaining_quantity, r.expected_price, r.packaging, r.invoice_type, r.payment_method, r.delivery_method, r.params_json, r.remark, r.expire_minutes, r.expire_time, r.purchase_lat, r.purchase_lng, r.purchase_address, r.status, r.create_time, r.update_time FROM bus_requirement r INNER JOIN bus_user_follow f ON f.follow_user_id = r.user_id AND f.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN bus_company c ON c.id = r.company_id AND (c.is_deleted IS NULL OR c.is_deleted = 0) LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = r.user_id AND u.del_flag = '0' WHERE r.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1 AND (r.expire_time IS NULL OR r.expire_time > NOW(3)) ORDER BY r.create_time DESC

SELECT s.id, s.company_id, s.user_id, c.company_name AS company_name, u.user_name AS user_name, u.nick_name AS nick_name, s.category_name, s.supply_no, s.origin, s.quantity, s.quantity AS remaining_quantity, s.ex_factory_price, s.ship_address, s.delivery_mode, s.packaging, s.storage_method, s.price_rules_json, s.params_json, s.status, s.expire_minutes, s.expire_time, s.remark, s.create_time, s.update_time FROM bus_supply s INNER JOIN bus_user_follow f ON f.follow_user_id = s.user_id AND f.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN bus_company c ON c.id = s.company_id AND (c.is_deleted IS NULL OR c.is_deleted = 0) LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = s.user_id AND u.del_flag = '0' WHERE s.is_deleted = 0 AND s.status = 0 AND (s.expire_time IS NULL OR s.expire_time > NOW(3)) ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bus_user_follow WHERE follow_user_id = #{followUserId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bus_user_follow WHERE user_id = #{userId}
